attributes.action: Petition for employers to allow their employees to work from home
attributes.additional_details: People have spent the last year working from home, and in some cases, have managed to make the transition to home without any issues. Some companies have even profited from the pandemic, spending less on electricity, water, cleaning offices etc… If your job requires you to work at a computer; and you can perform the same job from your home, at the same standards, you should be allowed to have your workdays at home. This has the potential to benefit both the employee, and the employers.
attributes.background: To introduce legislation employers to allow people to work from home part-time or full time if their job is allowing this.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570934
